name: Monk
description: A master of martial arts who uses the power of ki to channel unarmed combat and agility.
hp_at_higher_levels: 1d8 (or 5) + your Constitution modifier per Monk level after 1st
tool_proficiencies: one type of artisan's tools or one musical instrument

1.name: Unarmored Defense
1.description: While not wearing armor or wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

1.name: Martial Arts
1.description: Use Dexterity for unarmed and monk weapon attacks, deal a d4 in place of normal damage (scales with level), and make an extra unarmed strike as a bonus action after attacking with an unarmed strike or monk weapon.

2.name: Ki
2.description: Harness ki points to fuel features such as Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind. Ki points recover after a short or long rest and use Wisdom for save DCs.

2.name: Dedicated Weapon
2.description: After a rest, designate a simple or martial weapon you're proficient with (without heavy or special properties) as a monk weapon until you use this feature again.

2.name: Unarmored Movement
2.description: Your speed increases by 10 feet while not wearing armor or wielding a shield; this bonus improves at higher levels and lets you run along walls and across water at 9th level.

3.name: Deflect Missiles
3.description: Use your reaction to reduce the damage from a ranged weapon attack by 1d10 + Dexterity modifier + monk level, potentially catching and throwing it.

3.name: Monastic Tradition
3.description: Choose a monastic tradition that grants features at 3rd, 6th, 11th, and 17th level.

3.name: Ki-Fueled Attack
3.description: If you spend 1 or more ki points as part of your action on your turn, make one weapon or unarmed strike as a bonus action.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

4.name: Slow Fall
4.description: Use your reaction when falling to reduce falling damage by five times your monk level.

4.name: Quickened Healing
4.description: As an action, spend 2 ki points and roll your Martial Arts die to regain hit points equal to the roll + your proficiency bonus.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: Attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

5.name: Stunning Strike
5.description: When you hit with a melee weapon attack, spend 1 ki point to force the target to succeed on a Constitution save or be stunned until the end of your next turn.

5.name: Focused Aim
5.description: When you miss with an attack roll, spend up to 3 ki points to increase the roll by 2 per point, potentially turning the miss into a hit.

6.name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
6.description: Your unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.

6.name: Monastic Tradition Feature
6.description: You gain a feature from your chosen Monastic Tradition.

7.name: Evasion
7.description: When subjected to an effect that allows a Dexterity saving throw for half damage, take no damage on a success and half on a failure.

7.name: Stillness of Mind
7.description: Use your action to end one effect on yourself causing you to be charmed or frightened.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

9.name: Unarmored Movement Improvement
9.description: You can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling during the move.

10.name: Purity of Body
10.description: You are immune to disease and poison.

11.name: Monastic Tradition Feature
11.description: You gain a feature from your chosen Monastic Tradition.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement
12.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

13.name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
13.description: You understand all spoken languages, and any creature that knows a language can understand you.

14.name: Diamond Soul
14.description: You gain proficiency in all saving throws. When you fail a saving throw, spend 1 ki point to reroll it.

15.name: Timeless Body
15.description: You suffer none of the frailty of old age, can't be aged magically, and no longer need food or water.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

17.name: Monastic Tradition Feature
17.description: You gain a feature from your chosen Monastic Tradition.

18.name: Empty Body
18.description: Spend 4 ki points as an action to become invisible for 1 minute and gain resistance to all damage but force; spend 8 ki points to cast astral projection without material components.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Perfect Self
20.description: When you roll initiative and have no ki points remaining, you regain 4 ki points.
